editorialNotes.tagline: No data? No problem! Whether you’re hopping onto a plane or heading off the grid, disconnect with this great game.

ios.subtitle: Wreak Havoc as the Top Cat!
Grow to Eat! Snake Battle Game

editorialNotes.standard: This blockbuster runner keeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

ios.subtitle: From Farming Town to Big City
An Epic Build and Battle RPG

editorialNotes.tagline: Tons of fun on one screen

name: Daily Mahjong Match
artistName: Shanghai Diguo Network Technology Co., Ltd.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Hipster Whale's Apple Design Award–winning game takes a timeless arcade formula—cross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstacles—and transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, you’ll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. There’s a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other games—like Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Road’s wacky world are unmistakable.

name: Wool Sort: Knit Out & Wool Out

Fun Rhythm Song of Music Tiles
Dress Up Paper doll in DIY

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: If you’ve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. It’s delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in Pokémon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If you’re a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.
editorialNotes.short: Visit Puzzle Island for all-new games to play and special rewards.

editorialNotes.standard: We love chilling with friends in this classic card game’s standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.
